mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Farnsworth, Daniel D. T. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Farnsworth, Daniel D. T.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Oct 17 1861. By Telegraph from Buckhannon 1861. Poll Books Recd for & against new state none for congress or convention fourteenth for each required DDT Farnsworth 17D56pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Farnsworth, Daniel D. T.
Buckhannon, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
